name: Grab Game
description:
Grab Game by Gummywormz

https://gummywormz.github.io

Simple shooter game for Odd Weekend Jam 6.

Controls:
Up / W : Move Up
Down / S: Move down
Z / X / Enter / Space : Fire

Move over a bullet to pick it up, and return fire. You can only hold one bullet at a time.
If a bullet hits one of the cores, the core is lost. Lose all 4 cores and it is game over.

Game available to play on Windows via Neko and other platforms via Flash. Game also available on HTML5 on the main page.

Game is freeware, but do not host it on your website without permission
